Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -29,9 +29,203 @@
  • Service: The service provided by SearchYourTour® as described in these terms and on our website.
  • Website: The official website of SearchYourTour®, accessible via this URL: https://searchyourtour.com.
    • - +
    +

    Responsibilities of SearchYourTour®

    +

    SearchYourTour® acts solely as a ticket distributor and is not the organizer or "Provider" of events and attractions as defined by the Consumer Protection Law.
    + When you buy a SearchYourTour®, Cityberry® provides the Platform, but not the attractions and third-party services delivered by the Providers (hereafter referred to as "Attraction") included in the SearchYourTour®.
    + SearchYourTour® bears responsibility solely for sales and ticket distribution.
    + SearchYourTour® cannot be held liable for any loss or damages related to the event/attraction/show/service provider (hereafter referred to as "Provider").
    + By making a booking for an Attraction on our Platform, you agree to a direct contract with the Provider. The Provider is the party providing the Attraction and is solely responsible for delivering it.
    + Tickets and bookings, whether physical or electronic, are non-transferable and cannot be resold.
    + SearchYourTour® is not responsible for lost or damaged tickets.

    +
    +
    +

    Attractions & Services

    +

    Terms & Conditions of each Attraction may vary and are determined by the Provider.
    + SearchYourTour® customers are bound by the terms & conditions of Attractions available on each Attraction's webpage at the time when utilizing their SearchYourTour®.
    + Operating hours of each Attraction may vary, and users are advised to verify directly with the relevant Provider.
    + SearchYourTour® reserves the right to remove events, attractions, or shows from its services. In such cases, no refunds will be issued.
    + Customers are entitled to a number of credit points assigned to their passes depending on the pass option defined on the activation date.

    +
    +
    +

    Guided Tours

    +

    Guided Tours require advance reservation and the accompaniment of certified tour guides. Guests must adhere to the Guided Tours Timetable.
    + Users must refrain from disrupting guided tours. Cityberry reserves the right to exclude disruptive individuals from the tour.
    + Users are responsible for arriving punctually at the meeting point. Latecomers may not be permitted to join the tour. In such cases, no refunds will be issued.
    + Users traveling from abroad are solely responsible for possessing necessary travel documents and adhering to security regulations.

    +
    +
    +

    Credit System

    +

    SearchYourTour® provides Customer a number of credit points to be redeemed on the Attractions and Services.
    + Based on the pass option selected and the pass activation date, the number of credit points associated with each SearchYourTour®️ is subject to change.
    + When the pass is used to access or enter any activity, the credit points are redeemed, and the total available credit amount is reduced by the number of credit points for each attraction that is visited.
    + Customers will be entitled to use their available credit points for each activity.
    + The number of credit points for each activity is subject to change due to cost increases and the price fluctuations of each activity.

    +
    +
    +

    Usage of Show&Go Technology

    +

    Pre-Booking: Certain attractions may require pre-booking due to daily ticket limits. SearchYourTour is not responsible for any inconvenience or inability to access attractions if pre-booking is not completed.
    + Proximity and Internet Connection: To utilize the Show&Go Technology, you must be in close proximity to the attraction's ticket counter and have an active internet connection on your smartphone. The QR code will only be generated and displayed when you meet these requirements.
    + Skip the Ticket Line: The Show&Go Technology allows you to skip the ticket lines. However, it does not guarantee priority entrance or fast-track access to the attraction. You will still need to wait in line for security checks and other procedures as required by the attraction.
    + QR Code Validity: QR codes are valid for a limited time and for a specific attraction. Misuse, sharing, or attempting to use expired QR codes may result in denial of entry.

    +
    +
    +

    Savings Guarantee

    +

    Savings Guarantee: Cityberry guarantees you'll save money by purchasing the pass. If the total cost of activities you use during the validity period exceeds the regular price of those activities individually, Cityberry will refund the difference.
    + Requirements: To qualify for the Savings Guarantee, use your pass for at least three activities each day, throughout the entire duration of your pass.
    + Claim Submission: Submit a claim within 5 days of your pass's last use by emailing support@searchyourtour.com. Please include:
    + Your Pass ID and order confirmation number (found in your confirmation email).
    + A brief description of your claim.
    + Claim Review: We will review and respond to your claim within 7-10 business days after our Customer Support team carefully examines your Pass activity.
    + Refund Calculation: Refunds will be calculated based on the "Price Without Pass" sections listed for each Attraction. A 10% processing fee will be deducted from the total refund.

    +
    +
    +

    Payment

    +

    By purchasing any of the Services provided by SearchYourTour®, you agree to pay all applicable charges to your account for the Service, following the fee schedule and billing terms active at the time of payment.
    + The agreement with your Payment Provider will dictate your rights and responsibilities regarding the use of your credit card, so please refer to that document for details. When you provide your credit card number and payment details to SearchYourTour®, you authorize us to verify this information immediately and charge your account for any due fees without further notice or consent. It is your responsibility to notify SearchYourTour® promptly of any changes to your billing address or credit card information.
    + SearchYourTour® maintains the right to adjust its pricing and billing practices at any time, effective immediately upon updating on our website or through direct communication via email.
    + You are liable for covering any legal fees, court costs, or related expenses incurred in the process of collecting overdue, undisputed amounts.
    + A contract for the Service between you and SearchYourTour® will only be established once your order is confirmed through an official email, SMS/MMS, or similar communication.
    + You are accountable for any third-party charges that may arise while using the Pass.

    +
    +
    +

    Validity

    +

    Validity Period: The pass is valid for up to 1 year from the date of purchase.
    + Price Changes within the Validity Period: If the price of the pass increases during the validity period, you will be required to pay the difference between the original purchase price and the current price to activate the pass, plus a processing fee.
    + Duration of the Pass: Each purchased pass is valid from the date chosen during purchase for the duration specified.
    + Activation: The pass activates upon first use of an included activity or attraction.
    + Inclusions and Changes: Cityberry reserves the right to modify or discontinue attractions, schedules, content, and entry requirements at any time without prior notification.
    + Pass users acknowledge that included attractions, activities, and services may differ between the purchase and usage dates and hence can not be guaranteed due to factors such as provider changes, inactivity, or discontinuation of services.
    + Customers agree that they are eligible to use services or participate in activities that are included during their active pass dates only.
    + The Customers also agree to adhere to the most current terms and conditions of the Attraction by the Provider available during their visit.
    + Reservation Privileges: Pass holders are entitled to make reservations for participating attractions within a fifteen (15) day window prior to their desired visit date, irrespective of the date of purchase. However, these reservations are subject to availability and the specific terms and conditions set forth by each attraction.

    +
    +
    +

    Returns & Cancellations Policy

    +

    Orders can be canceled up to 24 hours before the Pass usage begins ("Cancellation Period", either one day before the nearest reservation or before the user visits any Attractions.
    + Cancellation requests after the Cancellation Period are subject to no refund.
    + Services must be used according to the terms written on each Attraction's webpage on the SearchYourTour® website.
    + Purchases of single-entry tickets made directly at attraction ticket offices or any other platforms are non-refundable by any means by SearchYourTour®. This includes any associated infant costs incurred at the attraction entrance.
    + Attractions requiring reservations must be canceled at least 24 hours prior to the attraction's scheduled start time to be eligible for a refund. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the start time, or failure to attend the attraction ('no-show'), will forfeit any right to a refund.
    + Public Transportation cards, once delivered, cannot be refunded. In the event of any errors, customers are required to contact Belbim, providing their relevant information. Replacement cards will be subject to the policies and procedures of the Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality, the Provider.
    + Unless otherwise explicitly stated, the following cancellation conditions apply to all Attractions:
    + All cancellations, including those for add-on services up to 3 days before your pass start date, will incur a 10% processing fee including bank charges and service fees.
    + If canceled less than 3 days before the pass start date, a 25% cancellation fee, including bank charges and service fees will incur.
    + Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the scheduled start time, or failure to attend ('no-shows'), will not receive a refund.
    + To request a refund, please email support@searchyourtour.com and include your SearchYourTour® Reference ID, along with any other documents relevant to your order.

    +
    +
    +

    Upgrade of the Pass

    +

    Upgrade Eligibility: Pass holders may upgrade their current pass by extending its duration (e.g., upgrading a 1-day pass to a 3-day pass).
    + Upgrades are limited to changes in pass duration only recent usage will remain used.
    + Upgrade Cost: The upgrade cost includes the difference in price between the original pass and the upgraded pass, plus a 10% of the upgraded pass price for upgrading & processing fee.
    + Activation and Validity: The upgraded pass maintains the validity and activation terms of the original pass unless otherwise stated.

    +
    +
    +

    Exceptional Circumstances for Activity Cancellation

    +

    SearchYourTour® reserves the right to cancel scheduled activities without prior notice due to weather conditions, governmental regulations, strikes, or other unforeseen and unavoidable external factors (including force majeure) that make the activity impossible, pose significant safety risks, or substantially hinder its execution. In the event of such cancellations, customers will have the option to reschedule their booking for an attraction.

    +
    +
    +

    Exclusion of Participation

    +

    Cityberry reserves the right to refuse participation in or exclude individuals from Attractions if they:
    + Fail to meet clearly stated participation requirements.
    + Pose a potential danger to themselves or others.
    + Disrupt activities, including behaviors resulting from drug or alcohol intoxication.
    + This policy applies to the individual making the booking and any others included in their reservation. In these instances, no refunds will be issued.

    +
    +
    +

    Pass Usage & Fraudulent Activity

    +

    Personal Use Only: Each SearchYourTour® is strictly for personal use and can only be used by one individual. Sharing a single pass to gain admission for multiple people is considered fraudulent activity. If misuse is detected, SearchYourTour® reserves the right to:
    + Immediately suspend or cancel the pass without a refund.
    + Restrict access to all pass-related services.
    + Take legal action against individuals or entities involved in fraudulent activities.
    + Credit Limit & Misuse: Every SearchYourTour® comes with a specific number of credits that determine access to attractions and services. Attempting to inflate, manipulate, or artificially increase credits through unauthorized means is strictly prohibited and considered fraud. SearchYourTour® reserves the right to:
    + Cancel the pass and deny access to attractions and services.
    + Seek reimbursement for any losses incurred due to misuse, including amounts contractually owed to partner attractions, legal fees, and recovery costs.
    + Pursue legal action if necessary.
    + Checking Your Remaining Credits: The credit balance on your pass is managed by SearchYourTour® and cannot be altered by users. To check your remaining credits, simply log into the SearchYourTour® App and navigate to the "My Istanbul" section. If you believe there is an error in your credit balance, please contact our Customer Support team for assistance.

    +
    +
    +

    Communication and Contact Permissions

    +

    By completing a purchase, users acknowledge Cityberry's right to contact them via email, phone calls, SMS, WhatsApp, and/or any other communication tools for transactional and informational purposes related to their purchase and the use of purchased services.
    + Users consent to the sharing of necessary contact details with third-party service providers to facilitate the fulfillment of Attractions and services associated with their purchase.

    +
    +
    +

    Changes to Our Terms & Conditions

    +

    By using the SearchYourTour®, you acknowledge that SearchYourTour® may, at its discretion, modify or discontinue the Service (or any feature within the Service), either temporarily or permanently, without prior notice. You can stop using the Service at any time without needing to inform SearchYourTour®. If your access is disabled or restricted, you understand that you may lose access to your account and any associated data or materials.
    + Website Modifications: SearchYourTour® reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate its website or any services it provides, temporarily or permanently, with or without prior notice, and shall not be liable for any consequence resulting from such actions.
    + Updates to the Website: From time to time, SearchYourTour® may implement updates or enhancements to the website's features and functionality, including patches, bug fixes, or general improvements ("Updates"). Such Updates may alter or remove certain features. You acknowledge that SearchYourTour® is not obligated to continue providing or supporting any specific functionality or feature. All Updates are considered part of the website and are subject to these Terms & Conditions.

    +
    +
    +

    Third-Party Services

    +

    The website may include content or services provided by third parties or links to external sites ("Third-Party Services"). SearchYourTour® holds no responsibility for the accuracy, quality, legality, or any other aspect of these third-party offerings. Any use of such services is at your own risk, and you should review their specific terms and conditions.

    +
    +
    +

    Term and Termination

    +

    This Agreement remains effective until terminated by you or SearchYourTour®. SearchYourTour® may suspend or terminate the Agreement at any time for any reason, with or without notice. If you violate any terms, this Agreement will terminate immediately without notice. Upon termination, you must discontinue use and delete all related copies of the Service. Termination does not limit SearchYourTour®'s rights or remedies under applicable law in case of breaches.

    +
    +
    +

    Copyright Notice

    +

    If you believe any material on our website infringes your copyright, please contact us with the following:
    + Signature of the copyright owner or representative
    + Identification of the material claimed as infringing
    + Your contact information
    + Statement of good faith belief of unauthorized use
    + Declaration of the accuracy of your notice under penalty of perjury and your authorization to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

    +
    +
    +

    Indemnification

    +

    You agree to indemnify and hold SearchYourTour®, its affiliates, partners, and licensors harmless from any claims, including legal fees, arising from:
    + Your use of the website
    + Violation of these Terms
    + Infringement of third-party rights.

    +
    +
    +

    No Warranties

    +

    The website is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranty. To the fullest extent permissible, SearchYourTour® disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a specific purpose, and non-infringement. No assurances are made regarding uninterrupted, error-free use, or the security of the content.

    +
    +
    +

    Limitation of Liability

    +

    SearchYourTour® and the Providers will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, even if advised of the potential damages. Liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service. In some jurisdictions, exclusions or limitations may not apply to you.

    +
    +
    +

    Severability

    +

    Should any provision be deemed unenforceable, the remaining terms will continue in effect. The Agreement, along with any relevant notices, comprises the full understanding between you and SearchYourTour®. No waiver of terms shall imply further or continued waivers.

    +
    +
    +

    Waiver

    +

    Failure to enforce any part of the Agreement does not constitute a waiver. No delay or partial exercise of any rights will prevent further enforcement.

    +
    +
    +

    Amendments

    +

    SearchYourTour® reserves the right to amend this Agreement. Only significant changes will be communicated directly. Continuing to use the website after changes implies your acceptance of the new terms.

    +
    +
    +

    Entire Agreement

    +

    This Agreement, including any supplemental terms and policies, represents the entire understanding between you and SearchYourTour®. You may be subject to additional conditions when purchasing specific services.

    +
    +
    +

    Intellectual Property

    +

    All contents of the website, including text, images, and software, are the property of SearchYourTour® or its licensors and protected by international laws. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

    +
    +
    +

    Dispute Resolution

    +

    Disputes, except those involving equitable relief for intellectual property rights, will be resolved through binding arbitration. Notices of a dispute must be sent to support@searchyourtour.com. Attempts to negotiate will last 60 days before arbitration may proceed.

    +
    +
    +

    Promotions

    +

    Any promotions hosted by SearchYourTour® may come with specific eligibility rules. Ensure you meet the criteria before participating. By entering, you agree to abide by those rules.

    +
    +
    +

    Typographical Errors

    +

    In the event of errors regarding product details or pricing, SearchYourTour® reserves the right to cancel affected orders.

    +
    +
    +

    Time Zone

    +

    Turkey Time Zone (UTC+03:00 year-round) shall be the governing time zone for all time calculations and deadlines. Cityberry's determination of time in this regard shall be considered authoritative.

    +

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -2,230 +2,74 @@

Terms and Conditions

Terms and Conditions | SearchYourTour

-

Introduction

-

SearchYourTour® is a brand of Cityberry® Tourism Agency ("Cityberry"), a TURSAB-registered member (License Number: 11745). Purchase of the SearchYourTour® and any associated services constitutes acceptance of the terms and conditions established by Cityberry®.

+

Last Updated: May 2024

+

+ Welcome to SearchYourTour! By accessing or using our website, mobile app, or any services provided by SearchYourTour®, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully. +

-

General Terms

-

The terms and conditions apply to the entirety of the website and the mobile app, and any email or other type of communication between the Customer and SearchYourTour®. Under no circumstances shall SearchYourTour® be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, including, but not limited to, loss of data or profit, arising out of the use, or the inability to use, the materials on this site.

+

1. Introduction

+

+ SearchYourTour® is a brand of Cityberry® Tourism Agency, a TURSAB-registered member (License Number: 11745). Purchase or use of SearchYourTour® services constitutes acceptance of these terms. +

-

Definitions and key terms

+

2. Definitions

    -
  • Agreement: Acceptance of to be fully bound by these Terms and Conditions upon accessing or using the Service.
    • -
  • Attractions: Any attractions, events, shows, guided tours, tours, audio guides, services, add-on services, discounted products, cards, passes, items, and such gathered in the Attractions section of the official website.
    • -
  • Cancellation Period: The specific timeframe and conditions under which a booking or order can be canceled.
    • -
  • Cookie: A small piece of data created by a website and stored on your web browser. Cookies are used to recognize your browser, collect analytics, and store information such as your language preferences or login credentials.
    • -
  • Company: When in the Terms and Conditions referred to "Company," "SearchYourTour®," "we," "us," or "our," "the Pass" it means Cityberry® Travel Technologies, (Ergenekon, Fransız Hastanesi Sokağı Kaya Apt No:1 Daire: 11, 34373 Şişli/İstanbul), which is responsible for your information under this policy.
    • -
  • Country: The jurisdiction where SearchYourTour® or its owners/founders are based, which in this case is Turkey.
    • -
  • Customer: Refers to the individual, organization, or entity that registers to use the SearchYourTour® Service to manage experiences or interactions with end users who can be referred to as "Pass holder", '"guest", "you", or "client".
    • -
  • Credit Points: Each SearchYourTour® is subject to a number of credit points depending on each day-option. The credit points are redeemed when the pass is used for each access or entry to any activity, and the total number of points is reduced by the defined number of points for each attraction attended. The number of points for each attraction or activity is subject to change, and the pass holder will be entitled to redeem the points for each activity against the pass credits assigned on the pass activation date.
    • -
  • Device: Any internet-connected device, including but not limited to a smartphone, tablet, or computer, that can be used to access and utilize SearchYourTour® services.
    • -
  • IP Address: A unique number assigned to every device that connects to the Internet. IP addresses are typically allocated in geographic blocks and can be used to identify the location of a device's connection to the Internet.
    • -
  • Personnel: Refers to individuals employed by SearchYourTour® or contracted to perform services on behalf of the company, provider, or associated parties.
    • -
  • Personal Data: Any information that identifies or can be used, alone or with other data, to identify a natural person, including identifiers like name or identification number.
    • -
  • Provider or Supplier: Refers to third-party service providers, attraction hosts, and other entities that provide products/services.
    • -
  • Service: The service provided by SearchYourTour® as described in these terms and on our website.
    • -
  • Website: The official website of SearchYourTour®, accessible via this URL: https://searchyourtour.com.
    • +
  • Company: Refers to Cityberry® Travel Technologies, responsible for your information under this policy.
    • +
  • Customer: The individual or entity using SearchYourTour® services.
    • +
  • Service: The services provided by SearchYourTour® as described on our website.
    • +
-

Responsibilities of SearchYourTour®

-

SearchYourTour® acts solely as a ticket distributor and is not the organizer or "Provider" of events and attractions as defined by the Consumer Protection Law.
- When you buy a SearchYourTour®, Cityberry® provides the Platform, but not the attractions and third-party services delivered by the Providers (hereafter referred to as "Attraction") included in the SearchYourTour®.
- SearchYourTour® bears responsibility solely for sales and ticket distribution.
- SearchYourTour® cannot be held liable for any loss or damages related to the event/attraction/show/service provider (hereafter referred to as "Provider").
- By making a booking for an Attraction on our Platform, you agree to a direct contract with the Provider. The Provider is the party providing the Attraction and is solely responsible for delivering it.
- Tickets and bookings, whether physical or electronic, are non-transferable and cannot be resold.
- SearchYourTour® is not responsible for lost or damaged tickets.

+

3. Use of Service

+
    +
  • Services are for personal, non-commercial use only.
    • +
  • Users must provide accurate information and comply with all applicable laws.
    • +
  • Unauthorized use, resale, or transfer of passes is prohibited.
    • +
-

Attractions & Services

-

Terms & Conditions of each Attraction may vary and are determined by the Provider.
- SearchYourTour® customers are bound by the terms & conditions of Attractions available on each Attraction's webpage at the time when utilizing their SearchYourTour®.
- Operating hours of each Attraction may vary, and users are advised to verify directly with the relevant Provider.
- SearchYourTour® reserves the right to remove events, attractions, or shows from its services. In such cases, no refunds will be issued.
- Customers are entitled to a number of credit points assigned to their passes depending on the pass option defined on the activation date.

+

4. Privacy and Cookies

+

+ Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your information. +

-

Guided Tours

-

Guided Tours require advance reservation and the accompaniment of certified tour guides. Guests must adhere to the Guided Tours Timetable.
- Users must refrain from disrupting guided tours. Cityberry reserves the right to exclude disruptive individuals from the tour.
- Users are responsible for arriving punctually at the meeting point. Latecomers may not be permitted to join the tour. In such cases, no refunds will be issued.
- Users traveling from abroad are solely responsible for possessing necessary travel documents and adhering to security regulations.

+

5. Payment, Cancellations, and Refunds

+
    +
  • All payments are subject to the terms stated at the time of purchase.
    • +
  • Cancellation and refund policies are detailed on our website and in your order confirmation.
    • +
  • For questions, contact support@searchyourtour.com.
    • +
-

Credit System

-

SearchYourTour® provides Customer a number of credit points to be redeemed on the Attractions and Services.
- Based on the pass option selected and the pass activation date, the number of credit points associated with each SearchYourTour®️ is subject to change.
- When the pass is used to access or enter any activity, the credit points are redeemed, and the total available credit amount is reduced by the number of credit points for each attraction that is visited.
- Customers will be entitled to use their available credit points for each activity.
- The number of credit points for each activity is subject to change due to cost increases and the price fluctuations of each activity.

+

6. Limitation of Liability

+

+ SearchYourTour® is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service. +

-

Usage of Show&Go Technology

-

Pre-Booking: Certain attractions may require pre-booking due to daily ticket limits. SearchYourTour is not responsible for any inconvenience or inability to access attractions if pre-booking is not completed.
- Proximity and Internet Connection: To utilize the Show&Go Technology, you must be in close proximity to the attraction's ticket counter and have an active internet connection on your smartphone. The QR code will only be generated and displayed when you meet these requirements.
- Skip the Ticket Line: The Show&Go Technology allows you to skip the ticket lines. However, it does not guarantee priority entrance or fast-track access to the attraction. You will still need to wait in line for security checks and other procedures as required by the attraction.
- QR Code Validity: QR codes are valid for a limited time and for a specific attraction. Misuse, sharing, or attempting to use expired QR codes may result in denial of entry.

+

7. Changes to Terms

+

+ We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via our website or by email. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. +

-

Savings Guarantee

-

Savings Guarantee: Cityberry guarantees you'll save money by purchasing the pass. If the total cost of activities you use during the validity period exceeds the regular price of those activities individually, Cityberry will refund the difference.
- Requirements: To qualify for the Savings Guarantee, use your pass for at least three activities each day, throughout the entire duration of your pass.
- Claim Submission: Submit a claim within 5 days of your pass's last use by emailing support@searchyourtour.com. Please include:
- Your Pass ID and order confirmation number (found in your confirmation email).
- A brief description of your claim.
- Claim Review: We will review and respond to your claim within 7-10 business days after our Customer Support team carefully examines your Pass activity.
- Refund Calculation: Refunds will be calculated based on the "Price Without Pass" sections listed for each Attraction. A 10% processing fee will be deducted from the total refund.

+

8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

+

+ These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Any disputes shall be resolved by the courts of Istanbul, Turkey. +

-

Payment

-

By purchasing any of the Services provided by SearchYourTour®, you agree to pay all applicable charges to your account for the Service, following the fee schedule and billing terms active at the time of payment.
- The agreement with your Payment Provider will dictate your rights and responsibilities regarding the use of your credit card, so please refer to that document for details. When you provide your credit card number and payment details to SearchYourTour®, you authorize us to verify this information immediately and charge your account for any due fees without further notice or consent. It is your responsibility to notify SearchYourTour® promptly of any changes to your billing address or credit card information.
- SearchYourTour® maintains the right to adjust its pricing and billing practices at any time, effective immediately upon updating on our website or through direct communication via email.
- You are liable for covering any legal fees, court costs, or related expenses incurred in the process of collecting overdue, undisputed amounts.
- A contract for the Service between you and SearchYourTour® will only be established once your order is confirmed through an official email, SMS/MMS, or similar communication.
- You are accountable for any third-party charges that may arise while using the Pass.

+

9. Contact

+

+ For any questions or concerns, please contact us at support@searchyourtour.com. +

-
-

Validity

-

Validity Period: The pass is valid for up to 1 year from the date of purchase.
- Price Changes within the Validity Period: If the price of the pass increases during the validity period, you will be required to pay the difference between the original purchase price and the current price to activate the pass, plus a processing fee.
- Duration of the Pass: Each purchased pass is valid from the date chosen during purchase for the duration specified.
- Activation: The pass activates upon first use of an included activity or attraction.
- Inclusions and Changes: Cityberry reserves the right to modify or discontinue attractions, schedules, content, and entry requirements at any time without prior notification.
- Pass users acknowledge that included attractions, activities, and services may differ between the purchase and usage dates and hence can not be guaranteed due to factors such as provider changes, inactivity, or discontinuation of services.
- Customers agree that they are eligible to use services or participate in activities that are included during their active pass dates only.
- The Customers also agree to adhere to the most current terms and conditions of the Attraction by the Provider available during their visit.
- Reservation Privileges: Pass holders are entitled to make reservations for participating attractions within a fifteen (15) day window prior to their desired visit date, irrespective of the date of purchase. However, these reservations are subject to availability and the specific terms and conditions set forth by each attraction.

-
-
-

Returns & Cancellations Policy

-

Orders can be canceled up to 24 hours before the Pass usage begins ("Cancellation Period", either one day before the nearest reservation or before the user visits any Attractions.
- Cancellation requests after the Cancellation Period are subject to no refund.
- Services must be used according to the terms written on each Attraction's webpage on the SearchYourTour® website.
- Purchases of single-entry tickets made directly at attraction ticket offices or any other platforms are non-refundable by any means by SearchYourTour®. This includes any associated infant costs incurred at the attraction entrance.
- Attractions requiring reservations must be canceled at least 24 hours prior to the attraction's scheduled start time to be eligible for a refund. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the start time, or failure to attend the attraction ('no-show'), will forfeit any right to a refund.
- Public Transportation cards, once delivered, cannot be refunded. In the event of any errors, customers are required to contact Belbim, providing their relevant information. Replacement cards will be subject to the policies and procedures of the Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality, the Provider.
- Unless otherwise explicitly stated, the following cancellation conditions apply to all Attractions:
- All cancellations, including those for add-on services up to 3 days before your pass start date, will incur a 10% processing fee including bank charges and service fees.
- If canceled less than 3 days before the pass start date, a 25% cancellation fee, including bank charges and service fees will incur.
- Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the scheduled start time, or failure to attend ('no-shows'), will not receive a refund.
- To request a refund, please email support@searchyourtour.com and include your SearchYourTour® Reference ID, along with any other documents relevant to your order.

-
-
-

Upgrade of the Pass

-

Upgrade Eligibility: Pass holders may upgrade their current pass by extending its duration (e.g., upgrading a 1-day pass to a 3-day pass).
- Upgrades are limited to changes in pass duration only recent usage will remain used.
- Upgrade Cost: The upgrade cost includes the difference in price between the original pass and the upgraded pass, plus a 10% of the upgraded pass price for upgrading & processing fee.
- Activation and Validity: The upgraded pass maintains the validity and activation terms of the original pass unless otherwise stated.

-
-
-

Exceptional Circumstances for Activity Cancellation

-

SearchYourTour® reserves the right to cancel scheduled activities without prior notice due to weather conditions, governmental regulations, strikes, or other unforeseen and unavoidable external factors (including force majeure) that make the activity impossible, pose significant safety risks, or substantially hinder its execution. In the event of such cancellations, customers will have the option to reschedule their booking for an attraction.

-
-
-

Exclusion of Participation

-

Cityberry reserves the right to refuse participation in or exclude individuals from Attractions if they:
- Fail to meet clearly stated participation requirements.
- Pose a potential danger to themselves or others.
- Disrupt activities, including behaviors resulting from drug or alcohol intoxication.
- This policy applies to the individual making the booking and any others included in their reservation. In these instances, no refunds will be issued.

-
-
-

Pass Usage & Fraudulent Activity

-

Personal Use Only: Each SearchYourTour® is strictly for personal use and can only be used by one individual. Sharing a single pass to gain admission for multiple people is considered fraudulent activity. If misuse is detected, SearchYourTour® reserves the right to:
- Immediately suspend or cancel the pass without a refund.
- Restrict access to all pass-related services.
- Take legal action against individuals or entities involved in fraudulent activities.
- Credit Limit & Misuse: Every SearchYourTour® comes with a specific number of credits that determine access to attractions and services. Attempting to inflate, manipulate, or artificially increase credits through unauthorized means is strictly prohibited and considered fraud. SearchYourTour® reserves the right to:
- Cancel the pass and deny access to attractions and services.
- Seek reimbursement for any losses incurred due to misuse, including amounts contractually owed to partner attractions, legal fees, and recovery costs.
- Pursue legal action if necessary.
- Checking Your Remaining Credits: The credit balance on your pass is managed by SearchYourTour® and cannot be altered by users. To check your remaining credits, simply log into the SearchYourTour® App and navigate to the "My Istanbul" section. If you believe there is an error in your credit balance, please contact our Customer Support team for assistance.

-
-
-

Communication and Contact Permissions

-

By completing a purchase, users acknowledge Cityberry's right to contact them via email, phone calls, SMS, WhatsApp, and/or any other communication tools for transactional and informational purposes related to their purchase and the use of purchased services.
- Users consent to the sharing of necessary contact details with third-party service providers to facilitate the fulfillment of Attractions and services associated with their purchase.

-
-
-

Changes to Our Terms & Conditions

-

By using the SearchYourTour®, you acknowledge that SearchYourTour® may, at its discretion, modify or discontinue the Service (or any feature within the Service), either temporarily or permanently, without prior notice. You can stop using the Service at any time without needing to inform SearchYourTour®. If your access is disabled or restricted, you understand that you may lose access to your account and any associated data or materials.
- Website Modifications: SearchYourTour® reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate its website or any services it provides, temporarily or permanently, with or without prior notice, and shall not be liable for any consequence resulting from such actions.
- Updates to the Website: From time to time, SearchYourTour® may implement updates or enhancements to the website's features and functionality, including patches, bug fixes, or general improvements ("Updates"). Such Updates may alter or remove certain features. You acknowledge that SearchYourTour® is not obligated to continue providing or supporting any specific functionality or feature. All Updates are considered part of the website and are subject to these Terms & Conditions.

-
-
-

Third-Party Services

-

The website may include content or services provided by third parties or links to external sites ("Third-Party Services"). SearchYourTour® holds no responsibility for the accuracy, quality, legality, or any other aspect of these third-party offerings. Any use of such services is at your own risk, and you should review their specific terms and conditions.

-
-
-

Term and Termination

-

This Agreement remains effective until terminated by you or SearchYourTour®. SearchYourTour® may suspend or terminate the Agreement at any time for any reason, with or without notice. If you violate any terms, this Agreement will terminate immediately without notice. Upon termination, you must discontinue use and delete all related copies of the Service. Termination does not limit SearchYourTour®'s rights or remedies under applicable law in case of breaches.

-
-
-

Copyright Notice

-

If you believe any material on our website infringes your copyright, please contact us with the following:
- Signature of the copyright owner or representative
- Identification of the material claimed as infringing
- Your contact information
- Statement of good faith belief of unauthorized use
- Declaration of the accuracy of your notice under penalty of perjury and your authorization to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

-
-
-

Indemnification

-

You agree to indemnify and hold SearchYourTour®, its affiliates, partners, and licensors harmless from any claims, including legal fees, arising from:
- Your use of the website
- Violation of these Terms
- Infringement of third-party rights.

-
-
-

No Warranties

-

The website is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranty. To the fullest extent permissible, SearchYourTour® disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a specific purpose, and non-infringement. No assurances are made regarding uninterrupted, error-free use, or the security of the content.

-
-
-

Limitation of Liability

-

SearchYourTour® and the Providers will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, even if advised of the potential damages. Liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service. In some jurisdictions, exclusions or limitations may not apply to you.

-
-
-

Severability

-

Should any provision be deemed unenforceable, the remaining terms will continue in effect. The Agreement, along with any relevant notices, comprises the full understanding between you and SearchYourTour®. No waiver of terms shall imply further or continued waivers.

-
-
-

Waiver

-

Failure to enforce any part of the Agreement does not constitute a waiver. No delay or partial exercise of any rights will prevent further enforcement.

-
-
-

Amendments

-

SearchYourTour® reserves the right to amend this Agreement. Only significant changes will be communicated directly. Continuing to use the website after changes implies your acceptance of the new terms.

-
-
-

Entire Agreement

-

This Agreement, including any supplemental terms and policies, represents the entire understanding between you and SearchYourTour®. You may be subject to additional conditions when purchasing specific services.

-
-
-

Intellectual Property

-

All contents of the website, including text, images, and software, are the property of SearchYourTour® or its licensors and protected by international laws. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

-
-
-

Dispute Resolution

-

Disputes, except those involving equitable relief for intellectual property rights, will be resolved through binding arbitration. Notices of a dispute must be sent to support@searchyourtour.com. Attempts to negotiate will last 60 days before arbitration may proceed.

-
-
-

Promotions

-

Any promotions hosted by SearchYourTour® may come with specific eligibility rules. Ensure you meet the criteria before participating. By entering, you agree to abide by those rules.

-
-
-

Typographical Errors

-

In the event of errors regarding product details or pricing, SearchYourTour® reserves the right to cancel affected orders.

-
-
-

Time Zone

-

Turkey Time Zone (UTC+03:00 year-round) shall be the governing time zone for all time calculations and deadlines. Cityberry's determination of time in this regard shall be considered authoritative.

-

Terms and Conditions

Terms and Conditions | SearchYourTour
Last Updated: May 2024
-

- Welcome to SearchYourTour! By accessing or using our website, mobile app, or any services provided by SearchYourTour®, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully. -

+

Introduction

+

SearchYourTour® is a brand of Cityberry® Tourism Agency ("Cityberry"), a TURSAB-registered member (License Number: 11745). Purchase of the SearchYourTour® and any associated services constitutes acceptance of the terms and conditions established by Cityberry®.

-

1. Introduction

-

- SearchYourTour® is a brand of Cityberry® Tourism Agency, a TURSAB-registered member (License Number: 11745). Purchase or use of SearchYourTour® services constitutes acceptance of these terms. -

+

General Terms

+

The terms and conditions apply to the entirety of the website and the mobile app, and any email or other type of communication between the Customer and SearchYourTour®. Under no circumstances shall SearchYourTour® be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, including, but not limited to, loss of data or profit, arising out of the use, or the inability to use, the materials on this site.

-

2. Definitions

+

Definitions and key terms

+

In this Terms & Conditions, the following definitions and key terms, when used, are strictly defined as:

    -
  • Company: Refers to Cityberry® Travel Technologies, responsible for your information under this policy.
    • -
  • Customer: The individual or entity using SearchYourTour® services.
    • -
  • Service: The services provided by SearchYourTour® as described on our website.
    • - +
  • Agreement: Acceptance of to be fully bound by these Terms and Conditions upon accessing or using the Service.
    • +
  • Attractions: Any attractions, events, shows, guided tours, tours, audio guides, services, add-on services, discounted products, cards, passes, items, and such gathered in the Attractions section of the official website.
    • +
  • Cancellation Period: The specific timeframe and conditions under which a booking or order can be canceled.
    • +
  • Cookie: A small piece of data created by a website and stored on your web browser. Cookies are used to recognize your browser, collect analytics, and store information such as your language preferences or login credentials.
    • +
  • Company: When in the Terms and Conditions referred to "Company," "SearchYourTour®," "we," "us," or "our," "the Pass" it means Cityberry® Travel Technologies, (Ergenekon, Fransız Hastanesi Sokağı Kaya Apt No:1 Daire: 11, 34373 Şişli/İstanbul), which is responsible for your information under this policy.
    • +
  • Country: The jurisdiction where SearchYourTour® or its owners/founders are based, which in this case is Turkey.
    • +
  • Customer: Refers to the individual, organization, or entity that registers to use the SearchYourTour® Service to manage experiences or interactions with end users who can be referred to as "Pass holder", '"guest", "you", or "client".
    • +
  • Credit Points: Each SearchYourTour® is subject to a number of credit points depending on each day-option. The credit points are redeemed when the pass is used for each access or entry to any activity, and the total number of points is reduced by the defined number of points for each attraction attended. The number of points for each attraction or activity is subject to change, and the pass holder will be entitled to redeem the points for each activity against the pass credits assigned on the pass activation date.
    • +
  • Device: Any internet-connected device, including but not limited to a smartphone, tablet, or computer, that can be used to access and utilize SearchYourTour® services.
    • +
  • IP Address: A unique number assigned to every device that connects to the Internet. IP addresses are typically allocated in geographic blocks and can be used to identify the location of a device's connection to the Internet.
    • +
  • Personnel: Refers to individuals employed by SearchYourTour® or contracted to perform services on behalf of the company, provider, or associated parties.
    • +
  • Personal Data: Any information that identifies or can be used, alone or with other data, to identify a natural person, including identifiers like name or identification number.
    • +
  • Provider or Supplier: Refers to third-party service providers, attraction hosts, and other entities that provide products/services.
    • +
  • Service: The service provided by SearchYourTour® as described in these terms and on our website.
    • +
  • Website: The official website of SearchYourTour®, accessible via this URL: https://searchyourtour.com.
-

3. Use of Service

+

Use of Service

  • Services are for personal, non-commercial use only.
  • Users must provide accurate information and comply with all applicable laws.
  • Unauthorized use, resale, or transfer of passes is prohibited.
-

4. Privacy and Cookies

+

Privacy and Cookies

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your information.

-

5. Payment, Cancellations, and Refunds

+

Payment, Cancellations, and Refunds

  • All payments are subject to the terms stated at the time of purchase.
  • Cancellation and refund policies are detailed on our website and in your order confirmation.
  • For questions, contact support@searchyourtour.com.
-

6. Limitation of Liability

+

Limitation of Liability

SearchYourTour® is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service.

-

7. Changes to Terms

+

Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via our website or by email. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

-

8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

+

Governing Law and Jurisdiction

These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Any disputes shall be resolved by the courts of Istanbul, Turkey.

-

9. Contact

+

Contact

For any questions or concerns, please contact us at support@searchyourtour.com.

    Use of Service

    -
      -

      • -
    • Users must provide accurate information and comply with all applicable laws.

      • -
    +

    Responsibilities of SearchYourTour®

    +

    SearchYourTour® acts solely as a ticket distributor and is not the organizer or "Provider" of events and attractions as defined by the Consumer Protection Law.
    + When you buy a SearchYourTour®, Cityberry® provides the Platform, but not the attractions and third-party services delivered by the Providers (hereafter referred to as "Attraction") included in the SearchYourTour®.
    + SearchYourTour® bears responsibility solely for sales and ticket distribution.
    + SearchYourTour® cannot be held liable for any loss or damages related to the event/attraction/show/service provider (hereafter referred to as "Provider").
    + By making a booking for an Attraction on our Platform, you agree to a direct contract with the Provider. The Provider is the party providing the Attraction and is solely responsible for delivering it.
    + Tickets and bookings, whether physical or electronic, are non-transferable and cannot be resold.
    + SearchYourTour® is not responsible for lost or damaged tickets.

    -

    Privacy and Cookies

    -

    - Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your information. -

    +

    Attractions & Services

    +

    Terms & Conditions of each Attraction may vary and are determined by the Provider.
    + SearchYourTour® customers are bound by the terms & conditions of Attractions available on each Attraction's webpage at the time when utilizing their SearchYourTour®.
    + Operating hours of each Attraction may vary, and users are advised to verify directly with the relevant Provider.
    + SearchYourTour® reserves the right to remove events, attractions, or shows from its services. In such cases, no refunds will be issued.
    + Customers are entitled to a number of credit points assigned to their passes depending on the pass option defined on the activation date.

    -

    Payment, Cancellations, and Refunds

    -
      -
    • All payments are subject to the terms stated at the time of purchase.
      • -
    • Cancellation and refund policies are detailed on our website and in your order confirmation.
      • -
    • For questions, contact support@searchyourtour.com.
      • -
    +

    Guided Tours

    +

    Guided Tours require advance reservation and the accompaniment of certified tour guides. Guests must adhere to the Guided Tours Timetable.
    + Users must refrain from disrupting guided tours. Cityberry reserves the right to exclude disruptive individuals from the tour.
    + Users are responsible for arriving punctually at the meeting point. Latecomers may not be permitted to join the tour. In such cases, no refunds will be issued.
    + Users traveling from abroad are solely responsible for possessing necessary travel documents and adhering to security regulations.

    -

    Limitation of Liability

    -

    - SearchYourTour® is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service. -

    +

    Credit System

    +

    SearchYourTour® provides Customer a number of credit points to be redeemed on the Attractions and Services.
    + Based on the pass option selected and the pass activation date, the number of credit points associated with each SearchYourTour®️ is subject to change.
    + When the pass is used to access or enter any activity, the credit points are redeemed, and the total available credit amount is reduced by the number of credit points for each attraction that is visited.
    + Customers will be entitled to use their available credit points for each activity.
    + The number of credit points for each activity is subject to change due to cost increases and the price fluctuations of each activity.

    -

    Changes to Terms

    -

    - We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via our website or by email. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. -

    +

    Usage of Show&Go Technology

    +

    Pre-Booking: Certain attractions may require pre-booking due to daily ticket limits. SearchYourTour is not responsible for any inconvenience or inability to access attractions if pre-booking is not completed.
    + Proximity and Internet Connection: To utilize the Show&Go Technology, you must be in close proximity to the attraction's ticket counter and have an active internet connection on your smartphone. The QR code will only be generated and displayed when you meet these requirements.
    + Skip the Ticket Line: The Show&Go Technology allows you to skip the ticket lines. However, it does not guarantee priority entrance or fast-track access to the attraction. You will still need to wait in line for security checks and other procedures as required by the attraction.
    + QR Code Validity: QR codes are valid for a limited time and for a specific attraction. Misuse, sharing, or attempting to use expired QR codes may result in denial of entry.

    -

    Governing Law and Jurisdiction

    -

    - These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Any disputes shall be resolved by the courts of Istanbul, Turkey. -

    +

    Savings Guarantee

    +

    Savings Guarantee: Cityberry guarantees you'll save money by purchasing the pass. If the total cost of activities you use during the validity period exceeds the regular price of those activities individually, Cityberry will refund the difference.
    + Requirements: To qualify for the Savings Guarantee, use your pass for at least three activities each day, throughout the entire duration of your pass.
    + Claim Submission: Submit a claim within 5 days of your pass's last use by emailing support@searchyourtour.com. Please include:
    + Your Pass ID and order confirmation number (found in your confirmation email).
    + A brief description of your claim.
    + Claim Review: We will review and respond to your claim within 7-10 business days after our Customer Support team carefully examines your Pass activity.
    + Refund Calculation: Refunds will be calculated based on the "Price Without Pass" sections listed for each Attraction. A 10% processing fee will be deducted from the total refund.

    -

    Contact

    -

    - For any questions or concerns, please contact us at support@searchyourtour.com. -

    +

    Payment

    +

    By purchasing any of the Services provided by SearchYourTour®, you agree to pay all applicable charges to your account for the Service, following the fee schedule and billing terms active at the time of payment.
    + The agreement with your Payment Provider will dictate your rights and responsibilities regarding the use of your credit card, so please refer to that document for details. When you provide your credit card number and payment details to SearchYourTour®, you authorize us to verify this information immediately and charge your account for any due fees without further notice or consent. It is your responsibility to notify SearchYourTour® promptly of any changes to your billing address or credit card information.
    + SearchYourTour® maintains the right to adjust its pricing and billing practices at any time, effective immediately upon updating on our website or through direct communication via email.
    + You are liable for covering any legal fees, court costs, or related expenses incurred in the process of collecting overdue, undisputed amounts.
    + A contract for the Service between you and SearchYourTour® will only be established once your order is confirmed through an official email, SMS/MMS, or similar communication.
    + You are accountable for any third-party charges that may arise while using the Pass.

    - - - - - - -
